title: Online Product Engineering Dojo
description: Product Engineering - designing and developing better products.

courses.title: Welcome
courses.description: Overview of the Online Product Engineering Dojo: the back story, the cast & the opportunity.

courses.title: Design Thinking
courses.description: Learn about the role of Design Thinking in Product Engineering.

courses.title: Getting Started
courses.description: Assessing current state of your teams' Product Engineering practices and how to start to improve them.

courses.title: Assessment
courses.description: This module contains a small exam. Pass the exam complete the dojo. Answers to all the questions are in the other modules.
